name: Genesis
effects: Physical light damage (1.8x, ATK) to all enemies
Inflict Blind and Disease (30%) on all enemies

desc_long: Deals light damage and chance of blinding and inflicting disease on all enemies.
對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊並施加失明生病的效果。
적 전체에 빛속성의 피해를 주고, 암흑과 질병을 부여합니다.
